EnemyInfo.Name: Mellow (MERO)
EnemyInfo.Description:
Mellow/mella/memu. Flies. Does not use "speed", "speed 2" nor "Tilemap". AI is exactly the same for all 3 enemies.
$A2:B16A: 20h. Angular speed when flying clockwise. Must be divisor of 200h $A2:B198: 20h. Angular speed when flying anti-clockwise. Must be divisor of 200h $A2:B1DC: 18h. Cooldown time after attacking in frames
RAM: $0FA8: Retreat timer. Used for after attack to fly back to original Y position and then for a fixed cooldown period $0FAA: X velocity (when attacking). Units of 1/100h pixels $0FAC: Y velocity (when attacking). Units of 1/100h pixels $0FAE: Target Y position (when attacking) $0FB0: Angle (when idling). Units of pi / 100h radians. Incremented by 20h (mod 200h) $0FB2: Function. Initialised to $B14E
